title: Aggressive

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-During the day, raise your defense by X+1 stages. X is the number of players youve killed.
-Attack a player at night. The Attack Value will be the same as your Defense Value.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-If you kill a Town member, suicide out of guilt the following night.
-Your defense reverts back to None at the end of each night.
